name: Dhampir Commander
description: A medium humanoid creature with vampiric traits, characterized by its commanding presence and combat prowess.
memorable: Can inspire allies to strike as a bonus action, and heals using necrotic damage dealt with attacks.
goals: To lead allies in combat and manipulate opponents through charm and tactics.
relations: May serve or lead other undead or vampiric creatures.
environment: Often found in dark and dimly lit areas, guiding factions or groups in dangerous territories.
strengths: High Charisma allows effective manipulation and control over interactions, and resilience against diseases.
weaknesses: Susceptible to radiant damage and can be overwhelmed if outnumbered.
attacks: Can make up to four rapier or four shortbow attacks, utilizing melee and ranged options effectively.
most_powerful_ability: Predatory Charm allows control over humanoids for tactical advantages.
equipment: Studded leather armor and a shield for defensive capabilities.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, enhancing visibility in dimly lit environments.
skills: Demonstrates proficiency in deception, intimidation, and persuasion, making it effective in social interactions.
additional_information: Can grant allies additional attack rolls with Leadership ability.
Undead Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against diseases.
Utilizes Dark Thirst to heal by dealing necrotic damage.
Inspiring Savagery ability enhances allies' combat effectiveness.
High Dexterity and Charisma for effective combat and social manipulation.
test_queries: monster that can heal while attacking
